channel.title: Please read and try to help!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, lately i've had a problem with compiling and running my client. No matter what client I use, an error like this pops up when I compile Applet_Sub1.java:12: error while writing Applet_Sub1: Applet_Sub1.class (Access is d enied) public class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
I haven't changed a thing at all. If you can help with this please ellaborate. Next error is with run, observe...
connecting to [server name] java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:41) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:41) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Playing jingle1.mp3
and then the client pops up but doen't connect to the title screen, example connecting to title screen, error retrying in 5 seconds... and so on... If you can help please post! :) thank you :confused: :confused:

item.title: Please read and try to help!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hello everyone, lately i’ve had a problem with compiling and running my client.
No matter what client I use, an error like this pops up when I compile
Applet_Sub1.java:12: error while writing Applet_Sub1: Applet_Sub1.class (Access is d
enied)
public class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

I haven’t changed a thing at all. If you can help with this please ellaborate.
Next error is with run, observe…

connecting to [server name]
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:212)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:98)
at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:41)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:212)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:98)
at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:41)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Playing jingle1.mp3

and then the client pops up but doen’t connect to the title screen, example
connecting to title screen, error retrying in 5 seconds… and so on…
If you can help please post!
thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Please read and try to help!
